Body:
from npdl.initializations import Orthogonal
gain = 2
sample = Orthogonal(gain).call((100, 200))
assert np.allclose(np.dot(sample, sample.T), gain * gain * np.eye(100),
    atol=1e-06)
gain = np.sqrt(2)
sample = Orthogonal('relu').call((100, 200))
assert np.allclose(np.dot(sample, sample.T), gain * gain * np.eye(100),
    atol=1e-06)
